item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, April 8, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Middle-aged man trading cards go viral in rural Japan town (945 points | 215 comments)
2. Any program can be a GitHub Actions shell (145 points | 24 comments)
3. Show HN: Browser MCP – Automate your browser using Cursor, Claude, VS Code (447 points | 168 comments)
4. Smallest Pacemaker Is the Size of a Rice Grain (33 points | 5 comments)

7. Paradigm (YC W24) Hiring Founding Engineers in SF ( | hide)
8. India's repair culture gives new life to dead laptops (117 points | 54 comments)
9. Neural Graffiti – Liquid Memory Layer for LLMs (11 points | 1 comment)

13. 'Exploding' Tunnock's teacakes cleared by tests to fly again (40 points | 13 comments)
14. Fifty Years of Open Source Software Supply Chain Security (140 points | 60 comments)

24. Rsync replaced with openrsync on macOS Sequoia (548 points | 427 comments)
25. Why Companies Don't Fix Bugs (91 points | 46 comments)
26. Hasochism: The pleasure and pain of dependently typed Haskell programming [pdf] (2013) (82 points | 12 comments)
27. PiDP-1, or the rebirth of an old machine (88 points | 31 comments)
28. Glamorous Toolkit (318 points | 125 comments)
29. 20 years of Git (261 points | 190 comments)
